message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a limited time. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  While I appreciate the deal, I'm looking to spend a bit less. Would you be willing to go down to $105?

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $115. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value of this product!
Alice, I appreciate you trying to find a middle ground, but $115 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $110. Let's meet in the middle and seal this deal.
I understand you're getting close to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to give a bit more. I can offer it to you for $112. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love this product!
